Time split between Aberdeen and Oxford, but mostly Oxford now I'm semi-retired.

note:
Bee charmer, mycophile, permaculture practitioner, land steward. Wild for unique fruit/veg cultivar. Mom to a great little human. Wife of a sailor. Invested in improving our pluralistic democracy. Avid reader of political news, with great appreciation of objective journalism. History and Archaeology nerd.
Avatar- handful of marbles pulled from the soils around our old house.
Background- a lovely compilation of lichen.
Landscape design artist who paints with plants and sometimes, oil paints.

I'm an #engineer & #writer. Also help authors promote their #books through Wise Grey Owl - https://www.wisegreyowl.co.uk (really).

Avatar: The Wise Grey Owl

I live in #Yorkshire and love #Walking. Have hiked the UK #CoastToCoast, #HadriansWall and the #ClevelandWay plus others and #trekked in China, Nepal, Vietnam & Morocco.

I have macular degeneration and want to make the most of my sight whilst I have it, so I like to paint, photograph & follow artists & photographers.

He/Him
